divs: Sighting DetailsI was traveling westbound on I-10 towards Beaumont , Tx from Lake Charles, La when I noticed very bright flashes of colored light that was coming from inside the clouds to my left . I monitored the lights dancing around for aprox. 5-10 min and was able to catch a few photos with my camera phone "one of which i am sending with this report" then they where gone . WHen I got home I uploaded the pictures I took and was happy to be able to share this one with everyone . This was taken through the front windshield without flash during the day with a camera phone if that helps .
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Lake Charles
There were no other sightings in Lake Charles on or around December 5th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Rainbow like balls of light at time of photo but changed.
